QuestData.Title: Glowing Arcane Jewel
QuestData.Description:
<This jewel seems to be quite powerful. There is an eerie glow to it.
Perhaps it's best to deliver it to the Kirin Tor for it to be placed in a safe spot.>
QuestData.LogDescription: Bring the Glowing Arcane Jewel to Noriko the All Knowing in Camp Antonidas.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Bring the Glowing Arcane Jewel to Noriko the All Knowing in Camp Antonidas.
